title: Magnificent memory
creator_credit: R Bacha, Film Group of India and R R D Productions
brief_description: The Mogul buildings in Delhi and the Kathak dance of Northern India. The first part of the film studies the architecture of the palaces and forts built by Shah Jehan, the Hall of Audience, the Pearl Mosque and the Red Fort nearby; the second part shows the Kathak dance in this setting.
